name: com.unity.adaptiveperformance.google.android
description:
The Adaptive Performance Android package provides the Adaptive Performance subsystem for Android platforms and works in combination with Adaptive Performance. 

By installing this package, you agree to the terms and conditions of the Unity End User License Agreement found under "View licenses" above.

_upm.changelog:
### Changed
* Native libraries are automatically excluded from the build if provider is disabled in Adapative Performance settings.
